articles.author: Kayezad E Adajania
articles.title: Simply Save | Why are Indians buying properties abroad? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: According to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Indians bought property worth $113 million abroad in 2021-22. Akash Puri, director, International Business, India Sotheby's International Realty, says that the trend will continue.
articles.content: Under the Indian governments Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS), all Indian nationals can send a sum of $250,000 abroad per financial year. When the scheme was started in 2004, it was just $25,000. … [+4646 chars]
